Title: The Other Side
Writer: Margaret Atwood (based on the novel by), Nina Fiore (executive story editor), John Hererra (executive story editor), Lynn Renee Maxcy (teleplay by), Bruce Miller (created by)
Actors: Elisabeth Moss, O-T Fagbenle, Rosa Gilmore, Tim Ransom
Plot: What happened to Luke after he was separated from June and his daughter Hannah. He tries surviving the harsh, new world alone so he can find them again.
